data.name: Ultron
data.description: A powerful robotic tyrant that summons drones to eliminate any threat to his mechanical regime.

starItems.name: Ultron
starItems.description: A powerful robotic tyrant that summons drones to eliminate any threat to his mechanical regime.

1.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to copy <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

2.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to copy <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to copy positive effects

3.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to copy <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
Clear <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> on primary target and self

4.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>230%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to copy <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>. Clear <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> on primary target and self.
4.nextUpgrade:
Always copy positive effects
Copied effects are cleared from the target

5.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>230%</color> damage + copy and clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>. Clear <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> on primary target and self.

6.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>270%</color> damage + copy and clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>. Clear <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> on primary target and self.

7.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>340%</color> damage + copy and clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>. Clear <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> on primary target and self.

1.description: Summon 1 Ultron Minion at 100% normal damage and 100% of normal Health. Apply Defense Up to self and all MASTERS OF EVIL allies for 2 turns. Possible Summons: > Ultron Incinerator
1.nextUpgrade: Summon 1-2 Ultron Minions +40% Ultron Minion damage Additional Possible Summon: > Ultron Accelerator

2.description: Summon 1-2 Ultron Minions at 140% normal damage and 100% of normal Health. Apply Defense Up to self and all MASTERS OF EVIL allies for 2 turns. Possible Summons: > Ultron Incinerator > Ultron Accelerator

3.description: Summon 1-2 Ultron Minions at 180% normal damage and 100% of normal Health. Apply Defense Up to self and all MASTERS OF EVIL allies for 2 turns. Possible Summons: > Ultron Incinerator > Ultron Accelerator

4.description: Summon 1-2 Ultron Minions at 220% normal damage and 100% of normal Health. Apply Defense Up to self and all MASTERS OF EVIL allies for 2 turns. Possible Summons: > Ultron Incinerator > Ultron Accelerator
4.nextUpgrade:
Summon <color=#86e619>2</color> Ultron Minions
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> Ultron Minion damage

5.description: Summon 2 Ultron Minions at 260% normal damage and 100% of normal Health. Apply Defense Up to self and all MASTERS OF EVIL allies for 2 turns. Possible Summons: > Ultron Incinerator > Ultron Accelerator
5.nextUpgrade: Summon 2-3 Ultron Minions +40% Ultron Minion damage Additional Possible Summon: > Ultron Fabricator

6.description: Summon 2-3 Ultron Minions at 300% normal damage and 100% of normal Health. Apply Defense Up to self and all MASTERS OF EVIL allies for 2 turns. Possible Summons: > Ultron Incinerator > Ultron Accelerator > Ultron Fabricator
6.nextUpgrade:
Summon <color=#86e619>3</color> Ultron Minions
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> Ultron Minion damage
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>:
 > Ultron Minions gain <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> and <color=#86e619>10%</color> Speed Bar
 > Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage
 > Gain assist from all Ultron Minion allies
 > These attacks are Unavoidable and cannot be blocked

7.description: Summon 3 Ultron Minions at 340% normal damage and 100% of normal Health. Apply Defense Up to self and all MASTERS OF EVIL allies for 2 turns. In CRUCIBLE: > Ultron Minions gain Deathproof and 10% Speed Bar. > Attack primary target for 200% damage. > Gain assist from all Ultron Minion allies. > These attacks are Unavoidable and cannot be blocked. Possible Summons: > Ultron Incinerator > Ultron Accelerator > Ultron Fabricator

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> Piercing damage. This ability deals double damage against targets with <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>. Gain <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy per positive effect on self.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.
Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, this attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>320%</color> Piercing damage. This ability deals double damage against targets with <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>. Gain <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy per positive effect on self.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.
Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, this attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>400%</color> Piercing damage. This ability deals double damage against targets with <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>. Gain <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy per positive effect on self.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.
Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, this attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>470%</color> Piercing damage. This ability deals double damage against targets with <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>. Gain <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy per positive effect on self.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.
Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, this attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>550%</color> Piercing damage. This ability deals double damage against targets with <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>. Gain <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy per positive effect on self.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.
Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, this attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>620%</color> Piercing damage. This ability deals double damage against targets with <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>. Gain <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy per positive effect on self.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.
Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, this attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing damage to primary attack
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL</color> allies, clear all <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> on primary target before dealing damage.

7.description:
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL</color> allies, clear all <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> on primary target.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>700%</color> Piercing damage. Gain <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy per positive effect on self.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.
Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, this attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

1.description:
If Health is full at the start of a match, gain <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> with <color=#86e619>35%</color> of this character's Max Health.

On Kill, prolong <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect on this character, all <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL</color> allies, and all <color=#fff568>VILLAIN TECH</color> allies by a duration of <color=#86e619>1</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
Revive with <color=#86e619>50%</color> of this character's Max Health
On Kill, prolong <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects

2.description:
If Health is full at the start of a match, gain <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> with <color=#86e619>50%</color> of this character's Max Health.

On Kill, prolong <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects on this character, all <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL</color> allies, and all <color=#fff568>VILLAIN TECH</color> allies by a duration of <color=#86e619>1</color>.
2.nextUpgrade:
On Kill, prolong <color=#86e619>4</color> positive effects
If this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL</color> allies, gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Crit Damage

3.description:
If Health is full at the start of a match, gain <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> with <color=#86e619>50%</color> of this character's Max Health.

On Kill, prolong <color=#86e619>4</color> positive effects on this character, all <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL</color> allies, and all <color=#fff568>VILLAIN TECH</color> allies by a duration of <color=#86e619>1</color>.

If this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL</color> allies, gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Crit Damage.
3.nextUpgrade:
Revive with <color=#86e619>75%</color> of this character's Max Health
On Kill, prolong all positive effects

4.description:
If Health is full at the start of a match, gain <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> with <color=#86e619>75%</color> of this character's Max Health.

On Kill, prolong all positive effects on this character, all <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL</color> allies, and all <color=#fff568>VILLAIN TECH</color> allies by a duration of <color=#86e619>1</color>.

If this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL</color> allies, gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Crit Damage.
4.nextUpgrade:
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Armor for self and all <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL</color> allies
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, on Spawn, gain <color=#86e619>15%</color> Speed Bar

5.description:
If Health is full at the start of a match, gain <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> with <color=#86e619>75%</color> of this character's Max Health.

On Kill, prolong all positive effects on this character, all <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL</color> allies, and all <color=#fff568>VILLAIN TECH</color> allies by a duration of <color=#86e619>1</color>.

If this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL</color> allies, gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Crit Damage.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>:
 > On Spawn, gain <color=#86e619>15%</color> Speed Bar.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Armor for self and all <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL</color> allies.
